shortdesc.ph: Jumps to a new playback position.
Jumps to a new playback position.

section.p: If you call after playback is complete (i.e., after receiving the callback reporting the playback state as PLAYER_STATE_PLAYBACK_COMPLETED or PLAYER_STATE_PLAYBACK_ALL_LOOPS_COMPLETED), the SDK restarts playback from the specified position and triggers the callback reporting the playback state as PLAYER_STATE_PLAYING. If you call while playback is paused, after a successful call, the SDK jumps to the specified position. To resume playback, call or .

If you call after playback is completed (i.e., after receiving the callback with state PLAYER_STATE_PLAYBACK_COMPLETED or PLAYER_STATE_PLAYBACK_ALL_LOOPS_COMPLETED), the SDK starts playback from the specified position and triggers the callback with state PLAYER_STATE_PLAYING. If you call while playback is paused, the SDK jumps to the specified position after a successful call. To resume playback, call or .

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is called successfully, the SDK triggers the callback to report the result of jumping to the new playback position.
After successfully calling this method, you will receive the callback reporting the result of the seek operation.

plentry.pd: The new playback position in milliseconds.
The new playback position in milliseconds.
